name: Recastle (Prototype)
description:
WARNING: WebGL Version has some rendering failures at the moment, please prefer playing standalone version if you're available <3

Pre-alpha show-off for fast-paced retro FPS metroidvania game Recastle.

Looking for your feedbacks ASAP! (Please check following roadmap first)

Click to Join Recastle Dev - Discord Server

Click here to check Actual Development Roadmap

Development was made in Unity.

Following asset packages partially used inside project:

- FPS Microgame

- Procedural Mesh Exploder
